panelsJSON.title: Top 20 Mime Types by File Count [Logs Corelight]

query.esql:
FROM logs-corelight.files*
| WHERE event.dataset == "files" AND file.mime_type == "application/x-dosexec" AND (NOT file.name RLIKE ".*exe.*")
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS COUNT() by file.name, file.mime_type 
| RENAME file.mime_type AS `Mime Type`, file.name  AS Filename, `COUNT()` AS Count
| SORT Count DESC
| LIMIT 15
| KEEP `Mime Type`, Filename, Count

FROM logs-corelight.files*
| WHERE event.dataset == "files" AND file.mime_type == "application/x-dosexec" AND (NOT file.name RLIKE ".*exe.*")
| LIMIT 10000
| STATS COUNT() by file.name, file.mime_type 
| RENAME file.mime_type AS `Mime Type`, file.name  AS Filename, `COUNT()` AS Count
| SORT Count DESC
| LIMIT 15
| KEEP `Mime Type`, Filename, Count
